item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Richard Sutton and Andrew Barto Win 2024 Turing Award (345 points | 76 comments)

6. Expanding AI Overviews and Introducing AI Mode (33 points | 37 comments)

8. How Math Academy pulled me out of the Valley of Despair (31 points | 9 comments)

10. The Tiny Star Explosions Powering Moore's Law (9 points | 2 comments)

13. The Differences Between Deep Research, Deep Research, and Deep Research (131 points | 42 comments)

15. Show HN: Beating Pokemon Red with RL and <10M Parameters (5 points | discuss)
16. After 120 years, Yellowstone bison are a single breeding population (43 points | 22 comments)

20. Mox – modern, secure, all-in-one email server (466 points | 257 comments)

22. Why Vermont farmers are using urine on their crops (95 points | 87 comments)
23. MacBook Air M4 (303 points | 315 comments)
24. How a key ingredient in Coca-Cola, M&M's is smuggled from war-torn Sudan (77 points | 37 comments)
25. NetBSD on a JavaStation (141 points | 62 comments)
26. Asteroid fragments upend theory of how life on Earth bloomed (83 points | 34 comments)
27. The Return of Digg, a Star of an Earlier Internet Era (112 points | 146 comments)
28. Rotors: A practical introduction for 3D graphics (2023) (52 points | 10 comments)
29. Brother accused of locking down third-party printer ink cartridges (466 points | 284 comments)
30. The Planemaker Who Walked Beneath the Water (16 points | 1 comment)
